Text:
Let us pray.
With humbled voices, Lord, we seek you. [t] Even today, we found you as we celebrated the mystery of your resurrection. [*] Now it is time to rest. Grant us your peace, and safety from all evils. Help us arise tomorrow rejoicing and praising you. Through Jesus Christ, our Lord.
Amen
Changes: 2022-08-09 - Paul Prins: Rewrite most of the prayer for flow, clarity, and create a sense of unity.
